name: Lab Mouse (ArtemisMoon)
description:
Description

"Lab Mouse" is a puzzle game made in rought 2 hours and 49 minutes for Trijam 193 with the theme of 'Patience!'

Gameplay

You are working in a lab performing tests on the mouse's ability to follow guidence through hazardous mazes. Click and Drag the cheese around to lure the mouse towards the goal.

Credits

Font

Joystix Font by Raymond Larabie at https://www.1001fonts.com/joystix-font.html

Audio

"success_bell" SFX by MLaudio at https://freesound.org/people/MLaudio/sounds/511484/

"Rat"SFX by egomassive at https://freesound.org/people/egomassive/sounds/536753/

"8Bit DNA" Music by timbeek.com at https://timbeek.itch.io/royalty-free-music-pack
